message.body: Annie called me and said she liked the idea of working with you. She is getting rid of the last drop and it will just be her and you doing the crane, with my helping you. I will be in charge of next two artists and you will help w them so you get the 'hang' of it, and then you'll take the lead and I'll be helping you instead. She will email you so just hold tight.
The nice thing about this is also that you get a fob to the crane now
Oh that's great!!
Yeah tell her I studied curating in MICA, I have a concentration in it
So this will be good!!
That's really good
Yeah that's great.
Yes this is great
It is a small space and with three people it should go smoothly
No one will feel overwhelmed
And that way no one is stuck for every second Thursday
One of us can be there for an hour and the next person can be there for an hour
Or we can alternate months or something
This is just easier for everyone
that's great because that was exactly what I was planning to do first when I start taking lead
I am setting up a simple indexhibit website for the crane too so we can do that together as well eventually
The reason we don't have a website is bc we can't agree on a name
She'll talk to you about it later
But basically I hate all her names and she hates mine
Annie and I have Very diff sensibilities
But we communicate well and are both generous and hard working so so far it's worked out
But we have very very different aesthetics and ideals about art
:) I think all her ideas are too granola -y and hippy dippy or community arts
And she thinks mine are too snobby
So I wanted a one word name for example
And she wanted a more inspiring positive message name haha
I dunno we will work it out
You could make a name that is somehow related to "icebox"
I wanted it to sound more like a gallery
So that people know it's in the same location as that gallery
And she wanted it to sound more like a supportive space for collaboration or something
I'll send you our ideas
But you'll see a general theme
Amongst ALL out disagreements
*our
lol I secretly want to be a Gallerista that speaks in art speak and trades in the material world of esoteric and exclusive objects
And she secretly wants to be a hippy girl who makes sculptures about veggies or paper puppets and where art has a 'purpose' and a clear narrative or reason for existing
Lol we have totally diff ideas about good art- BUt we have put on shows together and made it work. We try to compromise in a way that brings out both our strengths
The icebox idea might work
I'll send you all our name brainstorming
You know what's funny? I'm right in the middle of you guys, torn between the two things
I'm the best buffer.
Like I've done both and both are tempting to me haha
I hate community arts and I hate murals
There. I said it
And I she street art
Omg you must consider me hippy dippy too!
O___O
*and I hate
And I hate puppets
Lolololol and I hate the idea of making art accessible or hand holding
Hahahahahahaha I hide all my secret art biases bc I know few people agree
Hahaha I know
I just in general dislike murals
I dislike public art
Hahahahaha hahahahaha
I also hate photography
But I Especially hate street or urban photography
Lololol nah but, I respect differences you know?
I respect Annie and I respect that people like murals and puppets and art made by groups and bla bla
I am calling her a hippy w love ❤️ I am not trashing her
I'm saying we come from two diff perspectives and tastes and so we have come to a standstill over the name
we tried to set up a website months ago
But it's been months of disagreeing on the name lol
Yeah I'm definitely a good buffer for this. I can also decide on things quickly so I can help figure out a name soon
Hahaha that's so funny though...
I love public art but there is also a part of me that wants to be that classic art academic
WAIT HAHAHHA
I LITERALLY TEXTED YOU SAYING
"Pittsburgh was so fun I did some random street art lalalala"
And you were like ohhh great
BUT SECRETLY LITTLE DID I KNOW
Haha I know it's ok! Alec goes out and does street art
Lolol nah I mean, I saw a serious graffiti for awhile
And was still like wooooah that's cool
When he'd go out w his crew and paint
I mean, I can 'appreciate' it
Hahahaha
Good analogy yeah
Alec has a tag and my ex had a tag lol it's whatever
If you told me you baked a pie I'd tell you that was amazing too
But I hate baking
Know what I mean?
☺️ Alec's tag is a little dude made out of a heart
Lolol wait not gonna lie that sounds a little cheesy but I'm sure it's great and I would love it
Anyway cool I'm very excited
And thanks for like...still being involved. You're right -- I don't want this taking over my life
I can't handle being stressed outside of work anymore
It is super cheesy
He is a very cheesy young man hahaha
Oh definitely. It is too much work for one person
But 3 people should be good
Hey Ingrid, do you have a printer by any chance?! I need to print this measly piece of paper today for an interview tomorrow and it's screwing up my entire day lol.
Oh wait ugh I just remembered you don't live in the city anymore :/
No printer sorry
And yes printing one thing can totally ruin your day
Found a staples 20 mins away...
I should really invest in a printer at home
Anyway okay thanks!
Hope you're having a nice weekend
